rows.label: tlk70000032_05_msg0001
rows.name:
I talked to Master Seiryu recently,
and he said something that I can't
stop thinking about.

rows.label: tlk70000032_05_msg0002
rows.name:
He said that loss is inevitable in life, so
we need to treasure the things we get
in exchange for those losses.

rows.label: tlk70000032_05_msg0003
rows.name:
At first I thought he was talking about
my injured legs, but now I think there
was more to it than that...

rows.label: tlk70000032_05_msg0004
rows.name:
I think he was talking about the battles
we haven't fought yet.

rows.label: tlk70000032_05_msg0005
rows.name:
They'll be big ones.
No doubt about that.

rows.label: tlk70000032_05_msg0006
rows.name:
You have to come back. We can't
lose you. Iira needs you! The
future needs you!
